title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 379: Featuring Milan Hejduk + Adrian Kempe
description:
On Episode 379 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Milan Hejduk and Adrian Kempe. Milan joined (1:43:15) to discuss his legendary career in Colorado, escaping Communism, what he is up to now and some charity work he is doing. But first, the guys open the show talking about the slap heard around the world at The Oscars. The guys then dive into their trip to Wheeling and Atlanta and make a major show announcement. Next, the fellas talk NHL, and most importantly the Dadonov Non-Trade in Vegas. The guys are then joined by Biz’s former roomie, Adrian Kempe of the LA Kings. Adrian joined (3:05:48) to discuss the Kings, playing in LA, living with Biz and tons more. The guys wrap up with some random topics including an OnlyFans Dad, LeBron, Jimmy Butler and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
